comments:
I was in the Synchronize view and hit "show incoming changes only" and somehow
the Search Help toolbar item got focus. (perhaps an accidental click?) I thought
that I was in the Sync view so I started using the arrow keys to navigate. This
started searching (based on my last query) and brought up the Help Search
Results view. I closed it immediately (before the search was done) and got the
following error.

Starting application: 1712
